results.content:
Hi Toufiq Elahy,
      Greetings of the day!
At first, I would like to give you tons of thanks. I am using UDEMY since the last couple of years, but I rarely found the instructors like you. 
Once again, thanks a lot for your kind efforts. You are really a great instructor. You have explained each and everything very clearly and in a very simple way.
I recommend this course to every beginner who wants to learn Nodejs Express with SPA. It's really a very great course. I am running short of words to express the qualities of this course. Really speechless.

Regards,
Pushpendra Singh

response.content: than u so much... really inspiring me... i will help u if u get stuck in a problem..
response.content_html: than u so much... really inspiring me... i will help u if u get stuck in a problem..

At first, I would like to give you tons of thanks. I am using UDEMY since the last couple of years, but I rarely found the instructors like you.
Once again, thanks a lot for your kind efforts. You are really a great instructor. You have explained each and everything very clearly and in a very simple way.
I recommend this course to every beginner who wants to learn Nodejs Express with SPA. It's really a very great course. I am running short of words to express the qualities of this course. Really speechless.
